text: The 1958 Drexel Dragons football team represented the Drexel Institute of Technology (renamed Drexel University in 1970) as a member of the Middle Atlantic Conference during the 1958 NCAA College Division football season. Jack Hinkle was the team's head coach. ==Schedule== ==Roster== ==References== Drexel Category:Drexel Dragons football seasons Drexel Dragons football
title: 1958 Drexel Dragons football team
